basics.name: Raj Pratap Singh Gurjar
basics.label: Student
basics.summary:
I am a B.Tech student in Mathematics and Computing at the Department of Mathematics, IIT Patna, with an expected graduation in Spring 2028. 
	With a strong foundation in mathematics and algorithmic problem-solving alongwith strong grasp of core computer science concepts, including Operating Systems, Database Management Systems (DBMS), and Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), I am particularly interested in quantitative finance, algorithmic trading, competitive programming, and machine learningâ€”especially in natural language processing (NLP). 
My experience includes research consultancy at WorldQuant, where I develop quantitative trading strategies, and leading fAInance.pro and Trippr (self projects). I have a solid background in competitive programming. 
	Academically, I have excelled in mathematical competitions such as IOQM (Top 0.8%) and AIME, alongside achieving a 99.7 percentile in JEE Mains. My technical skills include Python, C++, Machine Learning frameworks (TensorFlow, Scikit-Learn), and financial modeling including.
	I am always eager to expand my knowledge and explore deeper into research, particularly in machine learning. I find the field fascinating and constantly seek opportunities to understand its intricacies, contribute meaningfully, and push my own boundaries in solving complex real-world problems.

courses: Probability Theory and Ordinary Differential Equations

work.summary: Research Consultants are creating alphas in a simulated environment to predict financial markets with low turnover and high returns.
highlights: Created 10+ Alphas predicting markets in US Top 3000 stocks
Implemented Super Alphas with 2+ Fitness ratio alongwith 3 Good alphas with 1.5+ Fitness ratio

work.summary: Schoolhouse.world platform is created for High school students from all around the globe to learn free of cost, and volunteers coming from all around the globe teaching them free of cost too.
highlights: Created the only Competitive programming course on the platform teaching students basics of CP ie :- sorting, greedy algorithms and time complexity to analyse algorithms.
Received Certifications and tutoring authorizations in 10+ courses and having helpful ratings of 90%+
